      • mouseState

        public void mouseState(float x,
                       float y,
                       boolean[] buttons)
        Updates the state of the mouse. This method does not calculate motion.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position of the mouse.
        y - The Y position of the mouse.
        button - The state of each mouse button.

           throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

        Parameters:
        g - The current graphics context.
        scaling - The scaling of the screen.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - If an error occurs when rendering.
